actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-572, by Mr. Beilenson.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 5099 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered except motion to recommit. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments. It shall be in order to consider the committee amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs now printed in the bill as an original bill and all points of order against said substitute shall be waived. It shall be in order to consider en bloc the amendments numbered 1 printed in the report accompanying this resolution and said amendments shall not be subject to a division of the question in the House or in the Committee of the Whole. All points of order against amendments No. 2 and 3 printed in the report for failure to comply with clause 7, rule XVI are waived. After passage of the bill, it shall be in order to consider a motion to take from t...
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 147.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5099) to provide for the restoration of fish and wildlife and their habitat in the Central Valley of California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5099 (Central Valley water project).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5099) to provide for the restoration of fish and wildlife and their habitat in the Central Valley of California, and for other purposes.
